content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Automation Science Pack Production Line (around x=8.5, y=13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5) moving items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine-1 at (8.5, 13.5) crafting automation science packs
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5) moving completed packs to output chest
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)

### Power Generation System (around x=-4.5, y=12-16)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5) providing water
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5) generating power
- Connected by pipe networks for water and steam
- Electrical network connecting various machines

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup 1 (around x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Output chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup 2 (around x=-18, y=-53)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Output chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5)

### Coal Mining Setup (around x=41, y=-82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Output chest at (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Issues with Extracting Items
- Ensure target chest contains the requested items before attempting extraction
- Verify the chest position and contents before attempting to extract items

### Power System Issues
- Monitor coal levels in boilers and add fuel before it runs out
- Keep coal reserves in inventory for power system maintenance

### Production Line Issues
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Monitor assembling machine input inventory to maintain continuous production
- Keep supply of both copper plates and iron gear wheels for automation science pack production

### Resource Management
- Maintain adequate coal supply for all burner-type machines
- Monitor and refill fuel for burner inserters to prevent production line stoppages
